pageContent: Background: The objective of this study was to evaluate the clinical usefulness of transrectal ultrasound (TRUS)-guided eight-core prostate biopsy for detecting prostate cancer in Japanese men.

metaData.source:
Re: Focal therapy for localized prostate cancer: a critical appraisal of rationale and modalities
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/18555492/
